title: Croustillants de Poulet MADIVIAL (Crispy Chicken Wraps)

instructions.instruction_text: Cut the chicken fillets lengthwise into 3 strips.
Squeeze lime juice and crushed garlic over the chicken strips. Add salt, pepper, and Provence herbs. Let marinate while you prepare the vegetables.
Wash and prepare all vegetables: peel the carrot and banana, remove seeds from the bell pepper.
Finely chop the parsley, country onion, and chili pepper.
Slice all vegetables (carrot, banana, bell pepper, shallot) into thin strips.
In a pan with olive oil, sauté each ingredient separately until tender: shallots first, then carrot, banana, bell pepper, and finally the marinated chicken strips. Set each aside as you finish.
Layer 2 brick pastry sheets together, brushing melted butter between them. Repeat with remaining sheets to make 4 wraps.
Place a portion of grilled vegetables and chicken on each double-layered pastry sheet.
Fold the pastry like a spring roll, tucking in the sides as you roll to seal the filling.
Place the rolls seam-side down on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Brush the tops with remaining melted butter.
Reduce oven temperature to 180°C and bake for 20 minutes until golden and crispy.
Immediately flip the wraps after removing from oven to crisp the bottom. Serve warm with a fresh salad.
